thread.section_title: The 2 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 2 Week Diet | www.2weekdiet.com
thread.title: sarah j.
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by sarah j.

author: sarah j.
title: sarah j.
text: I picked up " The 2 week Diet" handbook ( I must admit I was a bit suspicious at first) and I did not regret it for a second. Brian Flatt is a trained nutritionist worth his salt. This handbook is very detailed, and his methods are scientifically proven( substantiated with studies). And the best of all- once you reach your ideal weight( and from my experience it comes as quickly as promised), you will be able to eat anything you want(Brian will teach you what your ideal daily amount of calories is). It works!
